sentences.en: Clothes are a fundamental form of self-expression.
sentences.cn: 衣服是一种基本的自我表现形式。

sentences.en: Fresh air is fundamental to good health.
sentences.cn: 新鲜空气对健康是不可缺少的.

sentences.en: He believes better relations with China are fundamental to the well-being of the area.
sentences.cn: 他相信和中国建立更加良好的关系对这一地区的繁荣发展至关重要。

sentences.en: His only fundamental mistake, he insists, is that he was 20 years before his time.
sentences.cn: 他坚持认为，他仅有的根本性错误是他比时代超前了20年。

sentences.en: I knew she had some fundamental problems in her marriage because she had confided in me a year earlier.
sentences.cn: 我知道她的婚姻存在一些根本性的问题，早在一年前她就向我倾诉过。

sentences.en: Opportunism consists of sacrificing fundamental interests in order to gain temporary, partial benefits.
sentences.cn: 机会主义就是牺牲根本的利益,贪图暂时的 、 局部的利益.

sentences.en: Technical skill is a fundamental basis for most, if not all, great art.
sentences.cn: 技巧即使不是所有伟大艺术、也是其中大多数的根本基础。

sentences.en: The argument is full of fundamental flaws.
sentences.cn: 这段论述充满根本性的错误。

sentences.en: The fundamental cause of the development of a thing lies in its internal contradictoriness.
sentences.cn: 事物发展的根本原因在于其内部矛盾.

sentences.en: the fundamental principles of liberty and equality
sentences.cn: 自由和平等这两个基本原则

sentences.en: The fundamental problem lies in their inability to distinguish between reality and invention.
sentences.cn: 最根本的问题在于他们无法分清现实和虚构。

sentences.en: The fundamental way out for agriculture lies in mechanization.
sentences.cn: 农业的根本出路在于机械化.

sentences.en: The law of the unity of opposites is the fundamental law of the universe.
sentences.cn: 对立统一规律是宇宙的基本规律.

sentences.en: There is a fundamental difference between the two points of view.
sentences.cn: 这两个观点有根本区别。

sentences.en: This decision represents the fundamental interests of the people.
sentences.cn: 这个决定反映了广大人民的根本利益.

sentences.en: To our minds, capital construction is a fundamental task crucial for generations to come.
sentences.cn: 在我们看来, 基本建设是百年大计.

sentences.en: We have to tackle the fundamental cause of the problem.
sentences.cn: 我们必须解决问题的根本原因。
